column4: I have to 'etc/init.d/alsa force-reload' and unmute all my channels in order for my sound to work. any idea's ?
it works, but when i reboot. the alsa daemon isnt up
and I have to force the bastard up.
hold up a sec let me look it up
no off had, ill just lsmod it
do this apt-get install modconf and try adding the modules there,
so init looks a module for loading deamons?
well looking w/ lsmod was alittle harder then i thought. theirs tons of audio modules
can you tell me the sound card again?
do apt-cache search kernel-image and try downloading another kernel image
